Articles

As well as research papers, I have written articles for several newspapers and magazines, including Scientific American, Financial Times, The Times, Wired, BBC Focus, New Scientist and The Observer. In 2012, I won the Wellcome Trust Science Writing Prize.

You can read my latest posts on Substack.
